article.title: Boeing's Wideband Global SATCOM Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Satellite Systems Incorporated, El Segundo, California, is being awarded a $9,497,495 cost-plus-fixed-fee modification of the Wideband Global SATCOM Block II follow-on contract is for spacecraft modernization initiative digital channelizer upgrade study.Â U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
